name: Sidney Seashore
description: Sidney seashore is an amazing mix of views and experiences, both natural and man-made. Ocean, pebble beaches, view of islands and mountains, piers, marina, walking paths, sculptures, lawns, flowerbeds - imagine the possibilities to have your family, friends or romantic photoshoot with such surroundings. Our trip offers just this - you enjoy the views offered by Sidney-by-the-Sea, and we pick a few locations to create lasting memories of your visit.
